main-header: Join MFS — the most reliable and loyal fleet for food delivery couriers in the Czech Republic!
main-subheader: Register in just 5 minutes and start delivering.

ebike.title: Electric bicycle
ebike.amenities: Bigger, faster, more convenient, with a longer range
ebike.included: Includes: phone holder, lock, alarm, two batteries

how-to-start.title: How to start?
steps: Pick up the vehicle and the delivery box
You go online and start earning!

why-us.title: Why should you choose us?
why-us.support-link-aria: Write to MFS support in Telegram

item1.title: 1. Salary 4 times a month
item1.line1: Get your money often and without delays!
item1.line2: Forget about “waiting until the end of the month.”
item1.line3: We pay you every week – reliably, on time, by Wednesday at the latest!

item2.title: 2. We handle all the paperwork:
item2.line1: including your registration, documents, and formalities – everything is done quickly and without your involvement.
item2.line2: You just hop on the car / bike / scooter and start earning!

item3.title: 3. Electric transport without deposits or hidden fees,
item3.line1: including equipment and service fully covered in the rental price
item3.line2: Take it and go — no deposits, no headaches!

no-transport.title: No transport?
no-transport.text1: No problem! We offer fully serviced transport for working on Bolt Food and Foodora.
no-transport.text2-title: Everything is included in the price:
text2-list: Electric transport without deposits or hidden fees!

contacts.title: Contacts:
contacts.text1-line2: We will be happy to answer all your questions!

fields.name: Full name (Latin letters)
fields.address: Residence address in the Czech Republic
fields.desired_transport: What type of transport would you like to work with?
fields.how_found_it: How did you hear about us?
fields.invoice: Enter your Czech bank account number
fields.stay_type: What type of stay in the Czech Republic do you have?

documents.residence_permit: Residence permit photo or scan (both sides)

consent.label: I consent to the processing of my personal data

alert.consent: Please consent to the processing of personal data.

success.title: Thank you, you have successfully completed your registration in our fleet!

step.label: Next step :
step.description: Please review the training materials in presentation format. If you have any further questions, don't hesitate to contact us – we'll be happy to help!
step.subtitle: If you have any additional questions, do not hesitate to contact us - we will be happy to help!

instructions.heading: Next, follow these steps:
bolt: Download the Bolt Food Courier app and log in using your phone number.
foodora: Use your email and password to log in: Foodora321!!

success.password-note: Please do not change the password so that we can log in to the account and help you promptly in case of any difficulties during work.
success.store-note: If the app is not displayed in the App Store or Play Market, change the store region to the Czech Republic.

platform-features: · Schedule booking for the week ahead
